snippet: This East Village restaurant leaves it up to you to mix and match ingredients and seasonings....
abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Chinese restaurant MaLa Project in East Village section of Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: This East Village restaurant leaves it up to you to mix and match ingredients and seasonings.

headline.print_headline: With Sichuan Dry Pot, It’s Personal
headline.main: Sichuan Dry Pot, from Subtle to Scorching, at MaLa Project
